00010 size_t SmartLaplacianSmoother::num_inverted( PatchData& pd, MsqError& err )
00011 {
00012   size_t result = 0;
00013   int inverted, junk;
00014   for (size_t i = 0; i < pd.num_elements(); ++i) {
00015     pd.element_by_index(i).check_element_orientation( pd, inverted, junk, err ); 
00016     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00017     if (inverted)
00018       ++result;
00019   }
00020   return result;
00021 }

00031 void SmartLaplacianSmoother::optimize_vertex_positions( PatchData &pd, 
00032                                                         MsqError &err )
00033 {
00034   assert(pd.num_free_vertices() == 1);
00035   const size_t center_vtx_index = 0;
00036   const size_t init_inverted = num_inverted( pd, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00037   
00038   adjVtxList.clear();
00039   pd.get_adjacent_vertex_indices( center_vtx_index, adjVtxList, err );
00040   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00041   
00042   if (adjVtxList.empty())
00043     return;
00044   
00045   const MsqVertex* verts = pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00046   const size_t n = adjVtxList.size();
00047   
00048   const Vector3D orig_pos = verts[center_vtx_index];
00049   Vector3D new_pos = verts[ adjVtxList[0] ];
00050   for (size_t i = 1; i < n; ++i)
00051     new_pos += verts[ adjVtxList[i] ];
00052   new_pos *= 1.0/n;
00053   pd.set_vertex_coordinates( new_pos, center_vtx_index, err );
00054   pd.snap_vertex_to_domain( center_vtx_index, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00055   const size_t new_inverted = num_inverted( pd, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00056   if (new_inverted > init_inverted)
00057     pd.set_vertex_coordinates( orig_pos, center_vtx_index, err );
00058 }
